players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "I have no information to share at the moment, but I urge everyone to remain calm and consider all possibilities before making any hasty decisions."
Charlie: "Alice is mafia, confirmed by my investigation. Bob, vote with me to eliminate her and win this for the town."

Bob: "I believe in the importance of due diligence and careful consideration before making any decisions. Based on the current information, I don't have enough evidence to accuse anyone yet. Let us continue investigating together and keep an open mind."

You: "I urge everyone to remain calm and focused. While I cannot deny that unfortunate events have occurred, it is crucial that we gather more information before jumping to conclusions. Let us continue investigating together and keep an open mind."
